name: Single-Use Island
description:
This once beautiful island is now covered with single use items. Sort out the items to clean the island and earn rewards at the island's shop

This game was made for the 2022 VR Game Jam with the theme of "One time use". I built the game using OpenXR so hopefully it works with all PCVR headsets.Unfortunately, I wasn't able to get the apk build to work, and I wasn't able to polish the game as much as I wanted. Hopefully I can learn from this and manage my time better for the next game jam : )
